page.title: 18The Worst Shiskine Summer
page.content: {1985}has been one of the wettest summers in about twenty years. It has affected the farmers very badly. Crops have been flattened, hay has been lost and farmers have lost hundreds of pounds. On the{28th of July}the worst thunderstorm for 60 years struck. Here is what happened:- There was a close and clammy feeling about the air. It was a nice night so I went for a game of golf. We were at the first tee when there was a loud { {boom!}It was thunder.Lightning flashed and it was very frightening. It soon began to pour and pour and we ran to get sheltered from it. When we were back home I sat and watched the forked lightning zig zag in the sky. We tried the TV, but the lightning interfered. It rained and rained all night. In the morning our road had been washed away!
